<style>
/* Ensure the entire viewport is used and prevent root scrolling */
html, body {
    height: 100%; /* Make html and body fill the viewport height */
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    overflow: hidden; /* Prevent overall page scrolling on larger screens */
}

/* Make body the primary flex container for the page layout */
body {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column; /* Stack header, main, and footer vertically */
    height: 100vh; /* Ensure body takes full viewport height */
}


/* Optional: Style for a header if you have one */
.page-header {
    flex: 0 0 auto; /* Header takes its natural height and doesn't grow/shrink */
    padding: 1rem;
    background-color: #e0e0e0;
    text-align: center;
}

/* Adjust main to fill the available space */
main {
    flex: 1; /* Allows main to grow and shrink, taking remaining vertical space */
    display: flex; /* Enable flexbox for its children (e.g., carousel, main-content) */
    flex-direction: column; /* Stack children vertically within main */
    margin: 0 !important;
    padding: 0 !important;
    min-height: 0; /* Critical for flex items with overflow */
    overflow-y: auto; /* Allow scrolling *within* the main content area if it overflows */
}

/* Main content area should grow to take available space within 'main' */
.main-content {
    flex: 1; /* Allows this element to grow and shrink within 'main' */
    display: flex; /* Keep flexbox for its internal layout if needed */
    flex-direction: column;
    /* If content within .main-content might overflow, allow internal scrolling */
    overflow-y: auto; /* This allows specific content in .main-content to scroll, not the whole page */
    min-height: 0; /* Important for flex items to shrink correctly */
    padding: 1rem; /* Add some padding back for content */
}

/* For carousel - ensure it fits within its allocated space within 'main' */
.carousel-section {
    flex: 0 0 auto; /* It retains its intrinsic height/width */
    /* You might need to set a max-height if it's very tall */
    /* max-height: 40vh; */ /* Example: Limit carousel height to 40% of viewport */
    overflow: hidden; /* Hide any content that overflows the carousel itself */
}

/* General responsive adjustments (example) */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
    /* For smaller screens, allow scrolling if content doesn't fit */
    html, body {
        overflow: auto; /* Allow scrolling on smaller devices if needed */
    }
    body {
        height: auto; /* Auto height on smaller screens */
    }
    main {
        height: auto; /* Auto height on smaller screens */
        overflow-y: auto; /* Ensure main content can scroll on smaller screens */
    }
}
